SELECT GRNUM APPNUM, GRSTARTDATE, GRENDDATE, GRSUBJECT SUBJECT, GRMEMO, GRFILE, TO_CHAR(INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "DATE", TO_CHAR(UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE, DELETEYN, GENUM, WRITER, REFERENCE, APPROVER, DEPT, PROVAL, COUNT FROM GOAT_RESIGNATION WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y'
AND APPROVER LIKE '%' || #{gename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND COUNT < 0 AND WRITER LIKE '%' || #{gename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%' || #{gename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND REFERENCE LIKE '%' || #{gename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND GRNUM LIKE '%' || #{s_appnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND GRSUBJECT LIKE '%' || #{subject, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%' || #{s_writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND GRNUM LIKE '%' || #{appnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND INSERTDATE >= #{appstartdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND INSERTDATE <= #{appenddate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY 1

SELECT A.GRNUM GRNUM ,TO_CHAR(A.GRSTARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GRSTARTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.GRENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GRENDDATE ,A.GRSUBJECT GRSUBJECT ,A.GRMEMO GRMEMO ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE ,A.GENUM GENUM ,A.WRITER WRITER ,A.REFERENCE REFERENCE ,A.APPROVER APPROVER ,A.DEPT DEPT ,A.PROVAL PROVAL ,A.COUNT COUNT FROM GOAT_RESIGNATION A WHERE 1=1 AND DELETEYN = 'Y' AND GRNUM = #{grnum}
